definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: A young boy descends into a saphire mine in southern Madagascar.
sentences.chinese: 一個小男孩下到馬達加斯加南部的一個藍寶石礦裏。

sentences.english: The sweater is ornamented with jeweled embroideries.
sentences.chinese: 這件毛衣用鑲寶石的刺繡作裝飾。

sentences.english: As a Bodhisattva, he would usually be standing, and dressed in jewels.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一位菩薩，他通常是站立着，穿戴着寶石。

sentences.english: The application principles and methods are demonstrated of nuclear radiation technique in gemmology.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了核輻照技術在寶石學中的應用原理和方法。

sentences.english: Hang down on ear object the clear lapidary spirit gas like water is threatening.
sentences.chinese: 耳朵上垂墜水滴般清透的寶石靈氣逼人。

sentences.english: Which classes benefit most from Jewelcrafting?
sentences.chinese: 哪個職業將會從寶石學中受益最大？

sentences.english: Semi-precious stones were used for inlay ornamentation.
sentences.chinese: 準寶石的石頭用來做鑲嵌裝飾。

sentences.english: A green variety of chrysoberyl used as a gemstone.
sentences.chinese: 一種綠色的金綠寶石，用作寶石。

sentences.english: A green variety of chrysoberyl used as a gemstone.
sentences.chinese: 一種綠色的金綠寶石，用作寶石。

sentences.english: A skilled worker who and engraves precious stones .
sentences.chinese: 一個和雕刻珍貴寶石的工人。

sentences.english: The quality of Fraiar plum fruit was studied at low temperatures(5.
sentences.chinese: 貯藏對黑寶石李果實品質的影響。

sentences.english: Medium-bodied in deep ruby red color.
sentences.chinese: 中度酒體葡萄酒，呈深寶石紅色澤。

sentences.english: The blue-white brilliants are the stones of the "finest water" .
sentences.chinese: 蘭白色的寶石是光澤度最好的鑽石。

sentences.english: Like any gemstone, take care not to subject your amethyst jewellery to sharp blows.
sentences.chinese: 就像任何寶石，注意不要受到衝擊大幅貴紫晶首飾。

sentences.english: A glass cabinet holds a horse saddle encrusted in gems.
sentences.chinese: 一個玻璃櫃臺放着外表鑲嵌着寶石的馬鞍。

sentences.english: Small drops of glass can be used instead of jewels in many electric instruments.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃顆粒可代替寶石軸承安裝在電器儀表內。

definition: to inlay/to embed/to set (e.g. a jewel in a ring)/tiling/tesselation
shell/conch/cowry/mother of pearl/hard outer skin/also pr. [bei4 qiao4]
vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
